elapse.translation[0].definitions[0].def: if a particular period of time elapses, it passes
elapse.translation[0].definitions[0].exa: Several months elapsed before his case was brought to trial.
The assignment must be completed within an overall elapsed time of one week.
elapse.translation[0].definitions[0].not: Elapse is not used in the progressive You say
We hardly notice how much time elapses
We hardly notice how much time is elapsing
